name: How well do you know me!
name_original: How well do you know me!
description:
How well do you know your partner or friends ;) If you want to know then this app is perfect for you.

This game calculates how much you and your partner or friend know each other after by answering a set of questions. First, you have to give answer of 15 questions then you give the mobile device to your partner or friend whom you are playing. Now, it’s their turn to give answer to the same questions and will try to match with yours. At the end of the game, you will get a total score based on their responses.

Do you really know your partner or friend feelings? Give the test today and find it out.
